author: rdonkin
msg: MAILBOX-100 Presence of LICENSE and NOTICE documents in sub-modules is inconsistent. LICENSE and NOTICE only required at top level so to avoid future maintenance effort, removed NOTICE and LICENSE from all sub-modules.

author: antelder
msg: Add a simple Tuscany webapp project that could be used as the starting point for a Tuscany manager webapp (TUSCANY-3519)

author: rdonkin
msg: MAILBOX-100 Switch to conventional Maven naming for LICENSE and NOTICE documents. This should avoid duplication when assembling source release.
